summary: A young couple who live next to each other in tenement apartments do everything they can to be together despite of their feuding families.
cast: Buster Keaton|Edward F. Cline|Jack Duffy|The Flying Escalantes|Virginia Fox|Joe Keaton|Joe Roberts
director: Directors: Edward F. Cline (as Eddie Cline), Buster Keaton (as 'Buster' Keaton)
title: Keaton en Vecinos
